name: Swiss Efficiency
title: Top Government Effectiveness
description: In 2023, Switzerland ranked at the pinnacle of government effectiveness, achieving a perfect score in the upper bound of the 90% confidence interval percentile rank.

name: Chemical Champs
title: Leading Chemical Manufacturing
description: In 2021, chemicals accounted for 29.15% of Switzerland's manufacturing value added, showcasing its strong industrial sector.

name: Health Investment
title: High Private Health Expenditure
description: In 2022, Switzerland's domestic private health expenditure per capita was $7,131.24, reflecting a significant investment in health services.

name: Costly Care
title: High Out-of-Pocket Health Costs
description: In 2022, Swiss citizens spent $2,366.21 per capita on out-of-pocket health expenses, indicating a high personal financial burden for healthcare.

name: Negative Reserves
title: Negative Reserves Balance
description: In 2023, Switzerland's reserves and related items showed a negative balance of $132 billion, highlighting a potential area of economic concern.
